pages.text:
Directions to Florida Caverns RV Resort
Florida Caverns RV Resort allows easy access to I-10 and is convenient to all the attractions of the historic Marianna district, Florida, and surrounding area.
Eastbound from Pensacola, Florida: Take I-10 East towards Tallahassee leaving I-10 at Exit 142. Turn left from the off ramp. Go north on SR 71 for 1.6 miles, turn left on US 90. Entrance is two blocks on the right.
Westbound from Tallahassee, Florida: Take I-10 West towards Pensacola leaving I-10 at Exit 142. Turn right from the off ramp. Go north on SR 71 for 1.6 miles, turn left on US 90. Entrance is two blocks on the right.

Rallies & Group Events
Experience the perfect blend of natural beauty and modern amenities for your next rally or group event at Florida Caverns RV Resort. Nestled along Merritt’s Mill Pond in Marianna, Florida, our resort provides a unique setting surrounded by the lush landscapes of the Panhandle. Whether you’re planning a family reunion, club rally, or special group gathering, we offer an inviting environment and exceptional facilities tailored to make your stay unforgettable.

PLAN
Work with our team of RV Rally Experts to plan a fun and memorable experience for your group.

BOOK
With more than 100 sites, including big-rig friendly, pull-through, and concrete pads, there are plenty of options for parties of all sizes!

RALLY!
An expansive clubhouse, tons of amenities, and a sparkling pond means there are plenty of activities for your rally.
Why Choose Florida Caverns RV Resort?
Scenic Location:
Immerse your group in the tranquility of our resort located on the banks of Merritt’s Mill Pond, where you can explore the nearby Florida Caverns State Park and enjoy the natural wonders unique to North Florida.
Spacious Sites & Accommodations:
Our resort features a variety of RV sites equipped with full hookups and ample space to ensure comfort for all guests. We also offer cozy cabin rentals and park models for those who prefer a different lodging experience.
Modern Amenities:
Take advantage of our clubhouse, fully equipped with kitchen facilities, seating areas, and event space perfect for group activities, meetings, and meals. Enjoy our pool, playground, and outdoor recreation areas to keep everyone entertained.
Outdoor Activities:
Enhance your rally with kayaking, canoeing, fishing, or taking a stroll along Merritt’s Mill Pond. Engage in a group hike or arrange for a guided tour of the nearby caves to create memorable experiences for everyone.
Flexible Event Planning:
Our experienced staff will work with you to customize your event, ensuring all your specific needs are met. From setup to activity coordination, we’re here to make your event seamless.
Book Your Rally or Group Event Today!
Ready to plan your rally or group getaway? Contact us for more information on group rates, availability, and event coordination services. Our team is here to help craft an experience that combines relaxation, adventure, and connection.
Contact us via phone or email or fill out our Rally Inquiry Form below to speak with one of our staff members.
Phone:
(850) 482-5583
Email:
reservations@floridacavernsrvresort.com
